text:
Hi there!

I’m a web developer, fairly new to HubSpot CMS. I have a couple of questions, hopefully you guys can help me.

1. How can I fetch an existing js file from my current finder on HubSpot to my local machine? I was able to find in the documentation the following command: `hs fetch --account=<name> <src> [dest]`  but any name or src I used gave me the following errors: 
```[ERROR] The request failed because "script.js" was not found in account 6968579.
[ERROR] Failed fetch of file "script.js" to "/Users/Desktop/some-file-name" from the Design Manager```
2. In the Editor Page section, I want to control the colour and font size of a CTA (button), but I don’t have that option. How can I add that? I added a Field of CTA_text and CTA_link, and to those I want to be able to control the colour and font size.(screenshot attached).

Thank you all!

1. Make sure that you are using the correct path. In HubSpot's design manager, you can right-click on a file and "copy path" so that you are sure you are accessing it correctly using the CLI.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-local-development|HubSpot CLI/Local dev environment documentation>
2. If this was a native HubSpot CTA, you would control this in the CTA editor. Since this looks like a custom-built CTA module, you can either add those <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields|settings to the module as fields> or you can use CSS to control the color and font size.
